evidence.text:
JACOB: I love you.
ROMY: Love you.

ROMY: I want you to watch porn while you have sex with me.
ROMY: You touch me.
ROMY: No. Like this. You touch me.
ROMY: I’ve never had an orgasm with you-
JACOB: Did you- Did you mean what you said? About never-

JACOB: Who? Who did you meet?
JACOB: Jesus. What happened?
JACOB: What? Say something! Jesus Christ! Do I know him? Is it- is it Sebastian?
ROMY: What? No. No!
JACOB: What? He knew fucking what?
ROMY: How to be- fearless- around me- or- I mean- And I couldn’t resist that.
JACOB: How many times?
JACOB: Who is this guy? Are you in love with him?
ROMY: It was as if some sort of animal woke up inside me.
ROMY: For me it’s not about a safe space and a safe word and consent and “the kink”- I hate that word.
ROMY: It has nothing to do with us. With the -real- me. With our family. I love you! Please- I’m over it. It’s out of me, out of my system.
JACOB: It has everything to do with you! There is no excuse for this! Not your mom, not your childhood! You fucking lied to me! To us!
JACOB: Something needs to be at stake?? I don’t give a shit about your pathetic, banal sexual fantasies. It’s not about that! You jeopardized the most important thing... your children! You make me sick. Get the fuck out of my house! Now.

JACOB: You sat at my fucking table. You talked to my girls.
JACOB: How long? How fucking long? You lied to me- you fucking lied to me!
